title: Demographic changes and Green Revolution tech

content.question: Which of the following contributed most to the demographic changes shown on the graph above?

choices.label: Eradication of epidemic diseases in South Asia
Decreasing level of civilian casualties during military conflicts
Increasing fertility rates in western Europe

topic.text: 9.1: Advances in Technology and Exchange after 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
